sentences.en: And the king said, Enquire thou whose son the stripling is.
sentences.cn: 56王说, 你可以问问那幼年人是谁的儿子.

sentences.en: And the king said, Inquire thou whose son the stripling is.
sentences.cn: 撒上17:56王说 、 你可以问问那幼年人是谁的儿子.

sentences.en: He is a young man, hardly more than a stripling.
sentences.cn: 他是个小伙子, 尚不及而立之年.

sentences.en: On Wednesday, it was a sampler. She says the stripling's fun.
sentences.cn: 星期三, 要做样本拼布. 她说弯曲压线技巧很有趣.

sentences.en: The stripling helped the old man across the road.
sentences.cn: 年轻的男子帮助那老人过马路.

sentences.en: When he had spoken, John Alden , the fair - haired, taciturn stripling.
sentences.cn: 当他说话时, 约翰·奥尔登, 淡黄头发的, 沉默的年轻人.

trans.tran_en: a boy who is almost a young man – sometimes used humorously about a man who is quite old
